hadith.chapterTitle: Saying Bismillah Before and Al-Hamdulillah After Eating
hadith.body:
'Umar bin Abu Salamah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), said to me, "Mention Allah's Name (i.e., say Bismillah before starting eating), eat with your right hand, and eat from what is near you."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب التسمية في أوله والحمد في آخره
hadith.body: - عن عمر بن أبى سلمة رضى الله عنهما قال‏:‏ قال لي رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم‏:‏‏"‏سم الله وكل بيمينك، وكل مما يليك‏"‏.‏ ((متفق عليه))
